text:
Education: BS in CS, Unranked State School
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Amazon intern, two prior SWE internships at F500 companies.
Date of the Offer: Summer 2020
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Dev Engineer I
Location: Boston, MA
Salary: $116,100 USD
Relocation: $7,000 USD
Signing Bonus: $37,000 USD first year, $23,000 USD second year.
Stock bonus: $86,000 USD vesting over 4 years (5%/15%/40%/40%).
Bonus: N/A
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~$164,000 USD first year.
Benefits: 10 paid vacation days + standard paid sick leave days + 6 paid U.S. holidays + 6 paid personal days + 50% 401k match up to 2% w/ vesting contributions + Health/Dental/Vision Insurance
Other details: Did not negotiate as Amazon is very systematic about new grad offers and I was pleased with the offer.
